welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pleasant Valley, where the charm of small-town America meets breathtaking natural beauty. We invite you to explore our charming city and discover why it's known as a hidden gem among tourists. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and rental car facilities.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, Dutchess County Airport offers a dedicated terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal with check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private jets.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
